Category.Name: DeviceInformation
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to describe the device and its sensor
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to describe the device and its sensor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the name of the device's vendor
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the name of the device's vendor.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the model name of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a text description that indicates the model name of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceFirmwareVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device's firmware and software
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device's firmware and software.

StringReg.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
StringReg.ToolTip: A unique identifier for the device such as a serial number or a GUID
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that provides a unique identifier for the device such as a serial number or a GUID.

StringReg.Name: FactorySettingVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the version of the device'FactorySetting
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is a string that indicates the version of the device's Factory Setting.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.ToolTip: A device ID that is user programmable
StringReg.Description: This is a read/write element. It is a user programmable string.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the size of the acquired image and the format of the transferred pixel data
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the size of the acquired image and the format of the transferred pixel data.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the X offset (left offset) of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the X offset (left offset) for the area of interest in pixels, i.e., the distance in pixels between the left side of the sensor and the left side of the image area.

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the Y offset (top offset) for the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the Y offset (top offset) for the area of interest, i.e., the distance in pixels between the top of the sensor and the top of the image area.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the width of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the width of the area of interest in pixels.

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the height of the area of interest in pixels
Integer.Description: This value sets the height of the area of interest in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the depth of the pixel values in the image in bits per pixel
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a list of values that indicate the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images in bits per pixel. This value will always be coherent with the pixel format setting.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 8 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 8 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp10
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 10 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 10 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 12 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 12 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 16 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 16 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp24
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 24 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 24 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp30
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 30 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 30 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp32
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 32 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 32 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp36
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 36 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 36 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp48
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 48 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 48 bits per pixel.

EnumEntry.Name: Bpp64
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 64 bits per pixel
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value indicates that the depth of the pixel values in the acquired images is 64 bits per pixel.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the alignment of the camera's Bayer filter to the pixels in the acquired images
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only feature. This enumeration provides a list of values that indicate the alignment of the camera's Bayer filter to the pixels in the acquired images.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.ToolTip: NONE
EnumEntry.Description: NONE

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: BayerRG
EnumEntry.Description: BayerRG

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB
EnumEntry.ToolTip: BayerGB

EnumEntry.ToolTip: BayerGR
EnumEntry.Description: BayerGR

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG
EnumEntry.ToolTip: BayerBG
EnumEntry.Description: BayerBG

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Setting the format of the pixel data transmitted for acquired images
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the format of the pixel data transmitted for acquired images.

EnumEntry.Name: Undefined
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Undefined.
EnumEntry.Description: Undefined.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Mono 8
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 8.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8Signed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Mono 8 Signed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 8 Signed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 10.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 14.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Mono 16
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Mono 16.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 8
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 8.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 8
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 8.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 8.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 8.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 10
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 10.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 10.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 10.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 10
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 10.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 12
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 12.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 12
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 12.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB12
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 12
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 12.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 12
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 12.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG10Packed

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB10Packed

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 16
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GR 16.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 16
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer RG 16.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 16
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer GB 16.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 16
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to Bayer BG 16.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB8Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 8 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 8 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BGR8Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to BGR 8 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to BGR 8 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGBA8Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGBA 8 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGBA 8 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BGRA8Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to BGRA 8 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to BGRA 8 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 10 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BGR10Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to BGR 10 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to BGR 10 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 12 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BGR12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to BGR 12 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to BGR 12 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB16Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 16 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 16 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB10V1Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 10 V1 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 10 V1 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB10V2Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 10 V2 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 10 V2 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB12V1Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 12 V1 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 12 V1 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV411Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to YUV 411 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to YUV 411 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV422Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to YUV 422 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to YUV 422 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV422YUYVPacked
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to YUV 422 (YUYV) Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to YUV 422 (YUYV) Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: YUV444Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to YUV 444 Packed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to YUV 444 Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB8Planar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 8 Planar
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 8 Planar.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB10Planar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 10 Planar
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 10 Planar.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB12Planar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 12 Planar
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 12 Planar.

EnumEntry.Name: RGB16Planar
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the pixel format to RGB 16 Planar
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the pixel format to RGB 16 Planar.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selecting a test image from the list will enable the test image
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration provides a list of the available test images. Selecting a test image from the list will enable the test image.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Off.

EnumEntry.Name: GrayFrameRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: GrayFrameRampMoving.
EnumEntry.Description: GrayFrameRampMoving.

EnumEntry.Name: SlantLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: SlantLineMoving.
EnumEntry.Description: SlantLineMoving.

EnumEntry.Name: VerticalLineMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: VerticalLineMoving.
EnumEntry.Description: VerticalLineMoving.

IntReg.Name: SensorWidth
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the width of the camera's sensor in pixels
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates the actual width of the camera's sensor in pixels.

IntReg.Name: SensorHeight
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the height of the camera's sensor in pixels.
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates the actual height of the camera's sensor in pixels.

IntReg.Name: WidthMax
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed width of the image in pixels
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates maximum allowed width of the image in pixels taking into account any function that may limit the allowed width.

IntReg.Name: HeightMax
IntReg.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed height of the image in pixels
IntReg.Description: This is a read only element. It is an integer that indicates maximum allowed height of the image in pixels taking into account any function that may limit the allowed height.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to set the image acquisition parameters and to start and stop acquisition
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to set the image acquisition parameters and to start and stop acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Used by application software to set the mode of acquisition
Enumeration.Description: Used by application software to set the mode of acquisition. This feature indicates how image are sequenced out of the camera (continuously, single shot, multi-shot, …)

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the acquisition mode to continuous
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the camera's acquisition mode to continuous.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.Description: This command starts the acquisition of images. If the camera is set for single frame acquisition, it will start acquisition of one frame. If the camera is set for continuous frame acquisition, it will start continuous acquisition of frames.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.Description: If the camera is set for continuous image acquisition and acquisition has been started, this command stops the acquisition of images.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the trigger type to configure. Once a trigger type has been selected, all changes to the trigger settings will be applied to the selected trigger.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the trigger type to configure. Once a trigger type has been selected, all changes to the trigger settings will be applied to the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the frame start trigger for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger for configuration.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Setting the mode for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the trigger mode for the selected trigger.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Setting the signal source for the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the signal source for the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the software trigger as the signal source for the selected trigger
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to software trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the signal source for the selected trigger to line 0
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 0.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the signal source for the selected trigger to line 2
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 2. LineMode of Line2 must be Input

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the signal source for the selected trigger to line 3
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the signal source for the selected trigger to line 3. LineMode of Line3 must be Input

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: This command generates a software trigger signal.

IntSwissKnife.Name: TriggerSoftware_InqEnabled
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Determines if the TriggerSource is Software

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Setting the signal transition needed to activate the selected trigger
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the signal transition needed to activate the selected trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the selected trigger to become active on the falling edge of the source signal
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the selected trigger to become active on the falling edge of the source signal

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the selected trigger to become active on the rising edge of the source signal
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the sets the selected trigger to become active on the rising edge of the source signal.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the trigger delay time in microseconds.
Float.Description: This float value sets the trigger delay in microseconds to apply after the trigger reception before effectively activating it.

Float.Name: TriggerFilterRaisingEdge
Float.ToolTip: Setting value of raisingedge of the trigger filter
Float.Description: Raisingedge signal pulse width is smaller than this value is invalid.

Float.Name: TriggerFilterFallingEdge
Float.ToolTip: Setting value of fallingedge of the trigger filter
Float.Description: Fallingedge signal pulse width is smaller than this value is invalid.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Setting the exposure mode
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the exposure mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting the exposure mode to timed
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the exposure mode to timed.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.Description: This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

IntSwissKnife.Name: ExposureTime_InqEnabled
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Determines if the ExposureAuto is Off and ExposureMode is Timed

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Exposure Auto is the 'automatic' counterpart to manually setting an exposure time
Enumeration.Description: The exposure auto function automatically adjusts the Auto Exposure Time parameter value within set limits, until a target average gray value for the pixel data is reached.

IntSwissKnife.Name: ExposureAuto_InqEnabled
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Determines if the ExposureMode is Timed

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeMin
Float.ToolTip: Setting up automatic exposure time range of minimum
Float.Description: Setting up automatic exposure range of minimum. When the exposure is set to auto mode, this function works.

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeMax
Float.ToolTip: Setting up automatic exposure time range of maximum
Float.Description: Setting up automatic exposure range of maximum. When the exposure is set to auto mode, this function works.

Integer.Name: AAROIOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the X offset (left offset) of the rect of interest in pixels for 2A
Integer.Description: This value sets the X offset (left offset) for the rect of interest in pixels for 2A, i.e., the distance in pixels between the left side of the image area and the left side of the AAROI.

Integer.Name: AAROIOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the Y offset (top offset) for the rect of interest in pixels for 2A
Integer.Description: This value sets the Y offset (top offset) for the rect of interest for 2A, i.e., the distance in pixels between the top of the image area and the top of the AAROI.

Integer.Name: AAROIWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the width of the rect of interest in pixels for 2A
Integer.Description: This value sets the width of the rect of interest in pixels for 2A.

Integer.Name: AAROIHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the height of the rect of interest in pixels for 2A
Integer.Description: This value sets the height of the rect of interest in pixels for 2A.

Integer.Name: ExpectedGrayValue
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the value of ExpectedGrayValue
Integer.Description: This parameter is auto exposure and auto gain control of a benchmark parameter.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the acquisitionFrameRate is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the acquisitionFrameRate is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the acquisition frame rate to be set.
EnumEntry.Description: When Selected, It is disable user to setting the acquisition frame rate.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the acquisition frame rate to be set.
EnumEntry.Description: When Selected, enables setting the camera's acquisition frame rate to a specified value.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Float.Name: CurrentAcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum allowed frame acquisition rate.
Float.Description: Indicates the maximum allowed frame acquisition rate.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the operation of the camera's digital I/O lines
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the operation of the camera's digital I/O lines.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the I/O line to configure. Once a line has been selected, all changes to the line settings will be applied to the selected line.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the I/O line to configure. Once a line has been selected, all changes to the line settings will be applied to the selected line.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects line 0 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects line 0 for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects line 1 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects line 1 for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects line 2 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects line 2 for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects line 3 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects line 3 for configuration.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected line
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls whether the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal. When a Line supports input and output mode, the default state is Input to avoid possible electrical contention. Line Mode can take any of the following values: Input: The selected physical line is used to input an electrical signal. Output: The selected physical line is used to output an electrical signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected line to input
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected line to input.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the mode for the selected line to output
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets the mode for the selected line to output.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the signal inverter function for the selected input or output line.
Boolean.Description: This boolean value enables the signal inverter function for the selected input or output line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the source signal for the selected line (if the selected line is an output)
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the internally generated camera signal (source signal) for the selected line when the selected line is an output.

EnumEntry.Name: Strobe
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is Strobe.
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is Strobe.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is UserOutput0.
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is UserOutput0.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is UserOutput1.
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is UserOutput1.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Line output is UserOutput2.
EnumEntry.Description: Line output is UserOutput2.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates the current logical state for the selected line
Boolean.Description: This boolean value indicates the current logical state for the selected line at the time of polling.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the line status all chunk for enabling.
Integer.Description: This enumeration value selects the line status all chunk for enabling.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the user settable output signal to configure. Once a user settable output signal has been selected, all changes to the user settable output signal settings will be applied to the selected user settable output signal.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the user settable output signal to configure. Once a user settable output signal has been selected, all changes to the user settable output signal settings will be applied to the selected user settable output signal.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user settable output signal 0 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user settable output signal 0 for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user settable output signal 1 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user settable output signal 1 for configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user settable output signal 2 for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user settable output signal 2 for configuration.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Setting the state of the selected user settable output signal
Boolean.Description: This boolean value sets the state of the selected user settable output signal.

Category.Name: EventControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that control event generation by the camera.
Category.Description: This category includes items that control event generation by the camera.

Enumeration.Name: EventSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of event for enabling.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the type of event for enabling.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureEnd
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the end of exposure event for enabling.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the end of exposure event for enabling.

EnumEntry.Name: BlockDiscard
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the BlockDiscard event for enabling.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the BlockDiscard event for enabling.

EnumEntry.Name: EventOverrun
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the event overrun event for enabling.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the event overrun event for enabling.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStartOvertrigger
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the frame start trigger event for enabling.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the frame start trigger event for enabling.

EnumEntry.Name: BlockNotEmpty
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the BlockNotEmpty event for enabling.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the BlockNotEmpty event for enabling.

EnumEntry.Name: InternalError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the InternalError event for enabling.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the InternalError event for enabling.

Enumeration.Name: EventNotification
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the notification type that will be sent to the host application for the selected event
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the notification type that will be sent to the host application for the selected event.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets event notification to off
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value sets event notification to off.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the enables the event notification.
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value enables the event notification.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEnd
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Event ID for an exposure end event
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the Event ID for an exposure end event.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEndFrameID
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the frame ID for an exposure end event
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the frame ID for an exposure end event.

Integer.Name: EventExposureEndTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the time stamp for an exposure end event
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the time stamp for an exposure end event.

Integer.Name: EventBlockDiscard
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the BlockDiscard event ID
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the BlockDiscard event ID.

Integer.Name: EventBlockDiscardTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the time stamp for the BlockDiscard event
Integer.Description: Indicates the time stamp for the BlockDiscard event

Integer.Name: EventOverrun
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the EventOverrun event ID
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the EventOverrun event ID.

Integer.Name: EventOverrunTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the time stamp of the EventOverrun event
Integer.Description: Indicates the time stamp of the EventOverrun event

Integer.Name: EventFrameStartOvertrigger
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the FrameStartOvertrigger event ID
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the FrameStartOvertrigger event ID.

Integer.Name: EventFrameStartOvertriggerTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the time stamp of the FrameStartOvertrigger event
Integer.Description: Indicates the time stamp of the FrameStartOvertrigger event

Integer.Name: EventBlockNotEmpty
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the BlockNotEmpty event
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the BlockNotEmpty event.

Integer.Name: EventBlockNotEmptyTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the time stamp of the BlockNotEmpty event
Integer.Description: Indicates the time stamp of the BlockNotEmpty event

Integer.Name: EventInternalError
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the InternalError event
Integer.Description: This enumeration value indicates the InternalError event.

Integer.Name: EventInternalErrorTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the time stamp of the InternalError event
Integer.Description: Indicates the time stamp of the InternalError event

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the analog characteristics of the video signal
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the analog characteristics of the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the gain control to configure. Once a gain control has been selected, all changes to the gain settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the gain control to configure. Once a gain control has been selected, all changes to the gain settings will be applied to the selected control.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects all gain controls for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects all available gain controls for adjustment.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: This is an float value that sets the selected gain control in device specific units
Float.Description: The value is an float value that sets the selected gain control in units specific to the camera.

IntSwissKnife.Name: Gain_InqEnabled
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Determines if the GainAuto feature is selected Off

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Gain Auto is the 'automatic' counterpart of the manual gain feature.
Enumeration.Description: The gain auto function automatically adjusts the Auto Gain parameter value within set limits, until a target average gray value for the pixel data is reached.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Gain Auto function.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Gain Auto function.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting operation mode to 'continuous'.
EnumEntry.Description: When the 'continuous' mode of operation is selected, the parameter value is automatically adjusted while images are acquired. The repeated automatic adjustment will proceed until the 'once' mode of operation is used or until the auto function is set to 'off'.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting operation mode to 'once'.
EnumEntry.Description: When the 'once' mode of operation is selected, the parameter value is automatically adjusted until the related image property reaches the target value. After the automatic parameter value adjustment is complete, the auto function will automatically be set to 'off' and the new parameter value will be applied to the following images.

Float.Name: AutoGainMin
Float.ToolTip: Setting up automatic gain range of minimum
Float.Description: Setting up automatic gain range of minimum. When the gain is set to auto mode, this function works.

Float.Name: AutoGainMax
Float.ToolTip: Setting up automatic gain range of maximum
Float.Description: Setting up automatic gain range of maximum. When the gain is set to auto mode, this function works.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects a balance ratio to configure. Once a balance ratio control has been selected, all changes to the balance ratio settings will be applied to the selected control.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects a balance ratio control to configuration. Once a balance ratio control has been selected, all changes to the balance ratio settings will be applied to the selected control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the red balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the red balance ratio control for adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the green balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the green balance ratio control for adjustment.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the blue balance ratio control for adjustment
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the blue balance ratio control for adjustment.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Setting the value of the selected balance ratio control as a float
Float.Description: This value sets the selected balance ratio control as a float value.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Balance White Auto is the 'automatic' counterpart of the manual white balance feature.
Enumeration.Description: The automatic white balance is a two-step process: First, the Balance Ratio parameter values for red, green, and blue are each set to 1.0. Then, assuming a 'grey world' model, the Balance Ratio Abs parameter values are adjusted such that the average gray values for the 'red' and 'blue' pixels match the average gray value for the 'green' pixels.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the Balance White Auto function.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the Balance White Auto function.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting operation mode to 'continuous'.
EnumEntry.Description: When the 'continuous' mode of operation is selected, the parameter value is automatically adjusted while images are acquired. The repeated automatic adjustment will proceed until the 'once' mode of operation is used or until the auto function is set to 'off'.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Setting operation mode to 'once'.
EnumEntry.Description: When the 'once' mode of operation is selected, the parameter value is automatically adjusted until the related image property reaches the target value. After the automatic parameter value adjustment is complete, the auto function will automatically be set to 'off' and the new parameter value will be applied to the following images.

Enumeration.Name: AWBLampHouse
Enumeration.ToolTip: Setting the mode of AWB environment
Enumeration.Description: Refers to the AWB working environment.

EnumEntry.Name: Adaptive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Adaptive light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in Adaptive light mode

EnumEntry.Name: D65
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The D65 light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in D65 light mode

EnumEntry.Name: Fluorescence
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Fluorescence light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in Fluorescence light mode

EnumEntry.Name: Incandescent
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Incandescent light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in Incandescent light mode

EnumEntry.Name: D75
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The D75 light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in D75 light mode

EnumEntry.Name: D50
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The D50 light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in D50 light mode

EnumEntry.Name: U30
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The U30 light mode
EnumEntry.Description: The camera work in U30 light mode

Integer.Name: AWBROIOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the X offset (left offset) of the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance
Integer.Description: This value sets the X offset (left offset) for the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance

Integer.Name: AWBROIOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the Y offset (top offset) for the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance
Integer.Description: This value sets the Y offset (top offset) for the rect of interest for Auto WhiteBalance

Integer.Name: AWBROIWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the width of the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance
Integer.Description: This value sets the width of the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance

Integer.Name: AWBROIHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Setting the height of the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance
Integer.Description: This value sets the height of the rect of interest in pixels for Auto WhiteBalance

Enumeration.Name: DeadPixelCorrect
Enumeration.ToolTip: Whether to enable the deadpixel correct function
Enumeration.Description: The deadpixel correct function can eliminate dead pixels in the image

Enumeration.Name: FixedPatternNoiseCorrectMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the FixedPatternNoise is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the FixedPatternNoise is active.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disable the FixedPatternNoiseCorrectMode function.
EnumEntry.Description: Disable the FixedPatternNoiseCorrectMode function.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the FixedPatternNoiseCorrectMode function.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the FixedPatternNoiseCorrectMode function.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items used to control the operation of the camera's lookup table (LUT)
Category.Description: This category includes items used to control the operation of the camera's lookup table (LUT)

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the lookup table (LUT) to configure. Once a LUT has been selected, all changes to the LUT settings will be applied to the selected LUT.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration the lookup table (LUT) to configure. Once a LUT has been selected, all changes to the LUT settings will be applied to the selected LUT.

EnumEntry.Name: Luminance
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the luminance LUT for configuration
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the luminance LUT for configuration.

Register.Name: LUTValueAll
Register.ToolTip: Accesses the entire content of the selected LUT in one chunk access

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the Transport layer
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the Transport layer.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Size of the payload in bytes
Integer.Description: Size of images, in bytes, for the current format and size.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates the endianess of the bootstrap registers.
Boolean.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the endianess of the bootstrap registers. True = big endian.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indictes the character set.
Enumeration.Description: This is a read only element. Its value indicates the character set.

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the connection speed in Mbps for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the connection speed in Mbps for the selected network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the MAC address for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the MAC address for the selected network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selector the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selector the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates whether the function in GevSupportedOptionSelector is supported
Boolean.Description: Indicates whether the function in GevSupportedOptionSelector is supported

IntSwissKnife.Name: GevSupportedOption_value
IntSwissKnife.Formula: (SELECTOR = 0) ? VALUE0 : ((SELECTOR = 1) ? VALUE1 : ((SELECTOR = 2) ? VALUE2 : ((SELECTOR = 3) ? VALUE3 : ((SELECTOR = 4) ? VALUE4 : ((SELECTOR = 5) ? VALUE5 : ((SELECTOR = 6) ? VALUE6 : ((SELECTOR = 7) ? VALUE7 : ((SELECTOR = 8) ? VALUE8 : ((SELECTOR = 9) ? VALUE9 : 0xFFFFFFFF)))))))))

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given logical link.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current IP address for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current IP address for the selected network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current subnet mask for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current subnet mask for the selected network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current default gateway for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the current default gateway for the selected network interface.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file
StringReg.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the second URL to the XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: If fixed (persistent) IP addressing is supported by the device and enabled, sets the fixed IP address for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This value sets the fixed IP address for the selected network interface (if fixed IP addressing is supported by the device and enabled).

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: If fixed (persistent) IP addressing is supported by the device and enabled, sets the fixed subnet mask for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This value sets the fixed subnet mask for the selected network interface (if fixed IP addressing is supported by the device and enabled).

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: If fixed (persistent) IP addressing is supported by the device and enabled, sets the fixed default gateway for the selected network interface
Integer.Description: This value sets the fixed default gateway for the selected network interface (if fixed IP addressing is supported by the device and enabled).

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by the device
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the number of message channels supported by the device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by the device
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the number of stream channels supported by the device.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the heartbeat timeout in milliseconds
Integer.Description: This value sets the heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp clock ticks in 1 second
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the number of timestamp clock ticks in 1 second.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the packet size in bytes for the selected stream channel
Integer.Description: This value sets the packet size in bytes for the selected stream channel. Excludes data leader and data trailer. (The last packet may be smaller because the packet size is not necessarily a multiple of the block size for the stream channel.)

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the inter-packet delay (in ticks) for the selected stream channel
Integer.Description: This value sets a delay between the transmission of each packet for the selected stream channel. The delay is measured in ticks.

Integer.Name: BandwidthReserve
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the percentage of the Ethernet bandwidth assigned to the camera to be held in reserve. The reserve is used for packet resends and control data transmissions.
Integer.Description: Sets the percentage of the Ethernet bandwidth assigned to the camera to be held in reserve. The reserve is used for packet resends and control data transmissions.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of network interfaces on the device
Integer.Description: This is a read only element. It indicates the number of network interfaces on the device.

Integer.Name: EstimatedBandwidth
Integer.ToolTip: EstimatedBandwidth
Integer.Description: EstimatedBandwidth

Category.Name: TransferControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the Transfer Control features
Category.Description: The Transfer Control Model section describes the features related to the transfer of data by the device. It describes the basic Transfer Mode and the typical behavior of the device when sending data to the outside.

Enumeration.Name: TransferControlMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the control method for the transfers.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the control method for the transfers.

EnumEntry.Name: Basic
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Transfer flow control mechanism is disabled
EnumEntry.Description: This transfer mode is used to ensure compatibility with devices not aware of the transfer flow control mechanism.

EnumEntry.Name: UserControlled
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Transfer features are controlled transparently by the user
EnumEntry.Description: The Transfer features are controlled transparently by the user.

Enumeration.Name: TransferOperationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the operation method for the transfers.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the operation method for the transfers.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiBlock
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The transfer of the blocks of data terminates automatically after the transmission of TransferBlockCount or when an explicit TransferStop command is received
EnumEntry.Description: The transfer of the blocks of data terminates automatically after the transmission of TransferBlockCount or when an explicit TransferStop command is received.

Integer.Name: TransferBlockCount
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the number of data Blocks that the device should stream before stopping.
Integer.Description: Specifies the number of data Blocks that the device should stream before stopping.

Command.Name: TransferStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the devie
Command.Description: Starts the streaming of data blocks out of the devie

Category.Name: FrameBufferControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the Frame Buffer Control features
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the Frame Buffer Control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that control the configuration sets feature that is used to save sets of parameters in the camera
Category.Description: This category includes items that control the configuration sets feature that is used to save sets of parameters in the camera

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the configuration set to load, save, or configure. Once a configuration set has been selected, all changes to the configuration set settings will be applied to the selected configuration set.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration selects the configuration set to load, save or configure. Possible values for the User Set Selector are: Default: Selects a configuration set that contains factory settings. User Set 1: Selects the first user set. When the Default configuration set is selected and loaded using User Set Load, the device must be in default factory settings state and must make sure the mandatory continuous acquisition use case works directly. Default User Set is read-only and cannot be modified.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the default configuration set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the default configuration set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user set 0
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user set 0.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the selected configuration into the camera's volatile memory and makes it the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.
Command.Description: This command loads the selected configuration set from the non-volatile memory in the camera to the volatile memory and makes the selected set the active configuration set. Once the selected set is loaded, the parameters in the selected set will control the camera.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the current active configuration set into the selected user set.
Command.Description: This command copies the parameters in the current active configuration set into the selected user set in the camera's non-volatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the configuration set to be used as the default startup set. The configuration set that has been selected as the default startup set will be loaded as the active set whenever the camera is powered on or reset.
Enumeration.Description: This enumeration sets the configuration set to be used as the default startup set. The configuration set that has been selected as the default startup set will be loaded as the active set whenever the camera is powered on or reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the default configuration set
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects the default configuration set.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects user set 0
EnumEntry.Description: This enumeration value selects user set 0.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the chunk data features
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the chunk data features.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.Description: This boolean value enables the camera's chunk mode.

Integer.Name: ChunkFrameInterval
Integer.ToolTip: ChunkFrameInterval
Integer.Description: ChunkFrameInterval.

Integer.Name: ChunkFrameID
Integer.ToolTip: ChunkFrameID
Integer.Description: ChunkFrameID.

Category.Name: CustomFeature
Category.ToolTip: This category includes items that used to control the User Defined features
Category.Description: This category includes items that used to control the User Defined features.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates whether a live grab is under way

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the Camera.
